newsitem.title: FRANCE: Four soldiers killed in French Alps avalanche.
newsitem.headline: Four soldiers killed in French Alps avalanche.

text.p: Four French mountain troopers were killed and four or five others injured when an avalanche hit a party of 17 infantrymen climbing in the French Alps on Thursday, rescue services said.
The avalanche hit the climbers on the Evette glacier in the Haute Maurienne area near the Franco-Italian border, at an altitude of 3,200 metres (nearly 10,000 feet), rescue services said.
